headline: A Generation Familiar With War Confronts Fears of Another Conflict
abstract: As tensions escalated between the United States and Iran, young people had to come to terms with the possibility that for the first time, their generation would be on the front lines.
lead_paragraph: Over high school lunch tables, teenagers spoke of World War III. When they got home, they tearfully asked their parents whether they would be drafted. Social media feeds exploded with predictions of military action and wisecracking memes about end times.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
